data.text: Set in a prime location for those eager to discover Alsancak, Konak, and the nearby attractions, this hotel boasts a warm and welcoming atmosphere. With its friendly staff, impeccably clean rooms, and budget-friendly rates, it's an ideal choice for travelers. Nestled within easy reach of both the city center and various transportation hubs, it also offers the convenience of a short stroll to Kore Şehitleri Avenue.
data.title: City Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the ibis Izmir Alsancak. 

It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. I will share your comments with our team. I am sure that this feedback will serve as an encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one.

Sincerely,

Gülşah Sezen
General Manager
owner_response.author: Gulsah Sezen

data.text:
It's an Ibis Hotel- what could go wrong? Well not much. 

The room was pretty much a standard Ibis room, the same type of thing that you would get anywhere else in the world. The location of the hotel was excellent, with trams and trains a short walk away, supermarkets nearly next door and an entertainment district with heaps of bars and eateries close by. The price point was 'spot on' for what you were getting.

Look if you want somewhere reasonable, with Accor points and a great location go ahead and book it.
data.title: Pretty much Standard Ibis- Go Ahead and Book It.

data.text: We have business tour so we can't visit because we have very short time but izmir agroexpo especially have to much opportunity. We have completed our successful business tour. Maybe next time come to see turkey with family. Thank you so much people's of the turkey 💞💞💞.
data.title: Izmir agroexpo agricultural international fair

data.text: The air in my room seemed a bit dry. The service was really good but the breakfast seemed expensive. The coffee was great and the rooms were clean and secure. I had a reservation pro lem on checkin but it was quickly resolved. The location to the Izban and tramway was good.
data.title: Comfortable and close to public transportation.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Sincerely,
Gülşah Sezen
General Manager
owner_response.author: Gulsah Sezen

data.text:
I stayed here for 10 days.
The location is very convenient, in an instant you are in the centre and although I was in a busy location, the noise inside was 0.
My room was well stocked and one of the things I found fantastic was the bed, I slept and rested so much, it was super comfortable.
As for the lounge and breakfasts here too, I was treated very well indeed.
Friendliness and kindness are part of the DNA of this hotel.
The breakfast is both sweet and savoury (I ate some delicious cheeses, not to mention all the delicious sauces) and the super-qualified staff made me feel at home.
Thanks also to the room manager who was attentive to my every request and his service was one of the best I have found in recent times.

See you next year, see you soon ❤️
data.title: Beautiful experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Gaby,
We thank you for choosing ibis Izmir Alsancak.
We are honored to note your satisfaction with our services and it is always encouraging for us to learn that our guests are satisfied with our services as it is what we strive for every day.
We look forward welcoming you back in ibis Izmir Alsancak in the near future.
Sincerely Yours,
Gulsah Sezen, General Manager
owner_response.author: Gulsah Sezen
